name: Bradley A. Levinson

publications.text: Levinson, B., N. Gonzalez, and K. Anderson-Levitt (2015). Anthropological Approaches to the Study of Education: The United States and Beyond. In James D. Wright, Ed. International Encyclopedia of Social and Behavioral Sciences, 2nd Ed., Vol. 1. Pp. 728-733. Oxford: Elsevier.

Levinson, B. 2014. La antropologa de la educacin estadunidense: Temas y tensiones en el conocimiento de un campo social. (Reducing the gap between youth culture and teachers school culture: The institutional challenge to create a meaningful secondary school.) (The Schooling of Adolescents)
